product_name: NYX Professional MakeupLift & Snatch Brow Tint Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pen
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackGet a lifted eyebrow look, in a pen with NYX Professional Makeup Lift & Snatch Brow Tint Pen! This longwear brow pen provides transfer-resistant 16 hr wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsWaterproof eyebrow pen for a lifted brow lookFeatures a flexible micro-brush tip pen that allows you to create thin to thick lines that actually look like hairs so you can achieve natural looking brows or super snatched browsAvailable in many tinted shades16HR longwear formula, smudge-proof, transfer-resistant, waterproofCreate a brow from nothing, fill in sparse areas, or build on top of your already snatched eyebrowsFor a lifted brow, apply vertically in an upward flicking motion so that hairs stand up straightFor a laminated brow, first brush up hairs with NYX Professional Makeup Brow Glue and then fill in with Lift & SnatchVegan brow formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2579043How To UseShake pen at a downward angle. Fill in sparse areas with precise hair-like strokes and add definition to other brow areas. Pro-Tip: To create a lifted look, flick applicator in an upward, vertical motion. Press harder for thicker hair-like strokes and lighter for thinner more natural looking hair-like strokes.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol, Peg/Ppg-14/4 Dimethicone, Pvp, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Triisopropanolamine, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Laureth-21, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain / Peut Contenir (+/-): CI 77266 [Nano] / Black 2, CI 16035 / Red 40, CI 19140 / Yellow 5, CI 42090 / Blue 1
how_to_use: Shake pen at a downward angle. Fill in sparse areas with precise hair-like strokes and add definition to other brow areas. Pro-Tip: To create a lifted look, flick applicator in an upward, vertical motion. Press harder for thicker hair-like strokes and lighter for thinner more natural looking hair-like strokes.

reviews.headline: NOT WATERPROOF as advertised!!!
reviews.comments: I've purchased this AGAIN thinking I was getting something new because it's being advertised as waterproof. It is NOT waterproof! Nowhere on the packaging does it say its waterproof & the pen does not say its waterproof. Why does the description say its waterproof?!! It smears easily with water and sweat, plus it turns a horrible orange color after spending time in the sun :(

reviews.headline: Defiantly buying again
reviews.comments: I am absolutely in love with this product! It does take some practice and a light hand when first using it. It really makes my brows look natural and not drawn on.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Easy to use, great color, no oxidizing on dark color I use, and stays on ver well!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Easy to use. Looks good.  Great for filling in.

reviews.headline: From Overplucked to Microbladed Looking Results!
reviews.comments: I overplucked in high school and have no brow hairs in the inner corner. I've tried every method from ombre brows but nothing has looked as good as my tint pen. I found the secret is to apply on powder foundation and use setting powder to have a more natural look. I use brush strokes that fill in the missing hairs. People have asked me if I got my eyebrows microbladed. I also use this pen to give me false freckles.

reviews.headline: Great but not Waterproof
reviews.comments:
I've gone through two of these in Ash Brown and have had no issues with the tip bleeding or weird undertones. The shade Ash Brown is a neutral-cool medium brown tone that doesn't look too stark against my naturally very dark brown brows. I use this to fill in sparse areas and it's very easy to create hair-like strokes that look natural and not over-done. The tube lasts months with regular use. Bonus: it doubles as an eyeliner and makes for a killer wing thanks to the ultra-fine tip.

HOWEVER... It is absolutely NOT waterproof. I've swatched it on my hand and watched the product rinse away under running water without rubbing. If you touch your brows with a damp hand, it will run and fade. I've tested it while swimming and it didn't stand a chance. How they get away with marketing it as "waterproof" is a mystery to me. It performs very poorly under wet or sweaty conditions. That said, I do love the way it makes my brows look and it doesn't give me any issues on the (dry) day-to-day.

reviews.headline: Forget brows- perfect wings!
reviews.comments: This super fine point, waterproof formula is a fabulous job creating perfect winged eyeliner. Eye line, my eyes with my normal eyeliner and then use the NYX Lift & Snatch pen in a matching color to draw on perfect wings, whether I want them tiny little triangles or long drawn out points. Stains the skin well so that if it lightens up during the day from make up etc you can see exactly where to draw it back on perfectly. I've never even tried to use it as a brow pen. It's just that perfect for wings and I've recommended it to many people. I prefer the colors brunette, caramel, and auburn, depending on how dark my brown eyeliner is and how dramatic I want to be. Of course, black for high-drama days. Try you won't be disappointed!

reviews.headline: Taupe shade turns green
reviews.comments: I was really excited about this product, however ive noticed hours into the day that the taupe shade turns green. Fully green, not like a weird brownish green, but army green. I have literally had coworkers ask why I put green shadow in my eyebrows.

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: I've tried so many different eyebrow pencils/pens over the years and this is my favorite. It's affordable and easy to use. I will say the dispension of liquid is a mystery to me. Sometimes it will seem like it's dried up and then suddenly the next day, without anything having changed, it's bleeding excess ink. Also going on a plane/through elevation changes with it makes it bleed (even when it's 3 months old). I don't get it at all, but when it bleeds I just wipe away the excess.

reviews.headline: Irritates and bleeds
reviews.comments: This product irritates my skin making the top of my brows red. It also bleeds green or teal at the bottom of my brows.

reviews.headline: Formula change???
reviews.comments: I used to love this but i think they changed the formula or something? The taupe color has been oxidizing SUPER orange and i didn't used to have this problem. Disapointed i can no longer use this :(

reviews.headline: Best micro-fine brow pen I have used
reviews.comments: This brow pen is the first one I have tried that actually makes it easy for me to make hair-like strokes.  It dries quickly (but you still have a short window to blend) and it stays put all day.  Will definitely buy this one again.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Great price and easy to use better then the high priced brands .

reviews.headline: Best Eyebrow Pen!
reviews.comments: LOVE this. Have been using the Glossier one for years and this one is so much better! The ink flow is not too much, so you can actually draw fine lines. The tip is super fine as well. Highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Good for normal ppl
reviews.comments: I have a scar through my eyebrow and it doesn't work well over the scar but on my other brow it looks super natural!

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: This makes doing my eyebrows so much faster, I just wish I got a darker color

reviews.headline: Used to be great
reviews.comments: Would get lots of compliments on my eyebrows but had to stop using because all the tint pens bleed out causing them to dry out. It became hard to use due to the bleeding out.

reviews.headline: check the color every time you repurchase
reviews.comments: nice that its inexpensive and the brush tip is very fine. its really annoying that because of how sheer the product is you see the color undertone change drastically with each new batch. espresso, taupe and ash brown have been every color from a true cool brown to reddish orange to grey-green to purple when swatched. i already had my heart broken by their nude beige lip liner transforming from comparable to mac stone into a coral pink. just dont repurchase the same shade without testing first, its like theyre trying to shade match to the liquid in a test tube instead of a swatch of the final finish.

reviews.headline: I just ❤️
reviews.comments: I bought this by accident but I just love it. My brows look so nice like when I was younger..

reviews.headline: try something else
reviews.comments: does not last through out the day, smudges very easily, and bleeds horribly after a few uses

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using the Anastasia brow pomade but felt there was something missing. I won't lie this pen does require some practice and a very light hand since it's very pigmented but once you get the hang of it you can create beautiful natural looking brows!! Remember the little hair strokes don't have to be perfect just don't put much pressure on the pen itself! In the picture I only used this pen and some brow gel that's it! I will be getting other colors for my clients as I am a makeup artist. Definitely recommend it!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Lift n' Snatch in Espresso

faceoff_negative.comments:
Well...I was a bit perplexed, when my pen ran dry so quickly. So I decided I needed to take it apart and find out where all the liquid was, if it was dried up inside or maybe it was just plugged somehow. What I discovered was very disappointing, to say the least. I could hear that ball inside the bulk of the pen... where you would expect the well to be, like your regular writing or gel pens or markers... if you have or have had one of these pens, you know what I'm talking about. Just like fingernail polish, I would shake this pen, before using it and when it started drying out but it never seemed to help. 

Upon taking this pen apart, I discovered there was NEVER any liquid in the well or reservoir... where the ball is. It's just an empty tube with a little steel ball in it, rattling around to make you think there's something in there! You can tell from how clean and shiny the ball is, that there was never any eyebrow tint anywhere near it. I even ran a q-tip down through it to double check for any tint... none. 

The little brush has a short, thin part that is hidden down inside the pen... this is what holds the liquid and that is all... there's is no sign of eyebrow tint anywhere else in this whole pen! Now, if you ask me, if someone starts out deceptive, they know that they're in the wrong, to begin with and who can trust a company that is going to these lengths to deceive the customer??? Don't believe me...? Take one apart yourself and see what you find...
faceoff_negative.headline: Pen is Deceptive

rollup.name: Lift & Snatch Brow Tint Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pen
